raw_body:
VAN DORT – MARGERY EUNICE (Nee Atton). Dearly beloved wife of late Euty Van Dort,​ darling mother of Everard (US),​ Basil (Aus) and Benig (US),​ mother-in-law of Lanka,​ Trudy and Sharrel,​ grandmother of Kristina,​ Amanda,​ Arlene,​ Bethany,​ Trevine,​ Rebekah and Natalie,​ great grandmother of Kendall,​ Kayden,​ Lacienda and Leonardo,​ loving sister of Sheila,​ Barbara,​. Loxly and Conrad and of late George,​ Eva,​ Connie,​ Olean,​ Carmen,​ Doreen,​ Joan,​ Sidney and Brinsley. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour on Thursday,​ 18th April,​ 2024 from 11:00 a.m. onwards. Burial will take place on the same day at 4.30 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (Catholic Section).
025359
